original_rows.1: Earthing with CU earth plate 600mmX600mmX3mm thick, GI Pipe of 19mm dia, 2 meter length including accessories as required as per IS-3043. Following points to be considered with earth pit.
a. Masonary enclosure with cover plate having locking arrangement.
b. watering pipe
c. charcole, salt (approximately 15kg charcoal and 15kg salt for each pit ) Refer attached drawing for further consideration.
25mmX3mm CU strip for instrument panel earthing.
16 ways earthing copper plate with accessories

Earthing with GI earth pipe 3 meter long, 100 mm diameter including accessories as required as per IS-3043.  Following points to be considered with earth pit. a. Masonary enclosure with cover plate having locking arrangement. b. charcole, salt (approximately 15kg charcoal and 15kg salt for each pit) Refer attached drawing for further consideration.
50mmX6mm GI strip for main grid, panel earthing etc.
25mmX3mm GI strip for main grid, panel earthing etc.
10Sqmm CU earthing wire.
Conductor Material: Plain annealed high conductivity Flexible copper conductor as per Class 5 of IS 8130/84 latest.
Insulation material: PVC Type 'D' with FR-LSH Propertes.
Rated voltage: 1100 V
FRLS properties:
Oxygen Index Min. 29% as per ASTM D- 2863
Temperature Index Min. 250 Deg.C as per ASTM D- 2863
Smoke Density Rating Max. 60% as per ASTM D- 2843
Acid Gas Generation Max. 20% as per IEC- 754- 1
Max. conductor temp. under normal operating conditions 70deg C
16 ways earting GI plate with accessories
50Sqmm, 30m length CU earthing wire with clip reel & accessories
25mm dia, 1800mm long GI tube having single prong at top with 85mm dia 3mm thick GI base plate
150 mm GI perforated cable tray with coupler plate and accessories
300 mm GI perforated cable tray with coupler plate and accessories
50mm dia double corrugated HDPE conduit
100mm dia double corrugated HDPE conduit
Hand operated siren range 500 m
Electrical siren range 500 m, Voltage: 230VAC

Panel Constructional details:  Panel suitable for 415VAC,50Hz, 3Wire AC supply system fabricated in compartmentalised with CRCA sheet steel, thickness 2mm, treated with 7tank procees. Painting shall be powder coated and oven dried. Panel shall have withstand capacity of 25KA for 1 sec. Ingress protection shall be IP-42. It will have suitable MS base channel with powder coated. panel shall be fabricated in transportable section. The panel shall have a common CU earthbar of size 25mmX5mm at the rear with 2 nos earth stud. Stud type power terminal suitable for rated load to be considered. Connection to be done with PVC insulated CU conductor cable of required current rating. Paint shall be finalised during detail engineering.

Dual Incomer with Bus-coupler: 4 Pole 100A microprocessor based O/C, S/C & E/F releases with extended door handle.  SINGLE POINT EMERGENCY STOP SHALL BE PROVIDED. Out Going feeders:  a) 8 nos 32A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps. b) 4 nos 63A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps.  c) 1 no 16A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps.
